Instruction: 'Wash the kale leaves and remove the tough stems.'
'Tear the kale leaves into bite-sized pieces.'
'Cook the quinoa according to the package instructions.'
'Dice the cherry tomatoes and red onion.'
In a large bowl, combine the torn kale leaves, cooked quinoa, diced cherry tomatoes, diced red onion, and crumbled feta cheese.'
'Drizzle lemon juice and olive oil over the salad.'
'Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving.'
